name: charity-foundation
description: Modern responsive charity foundation website (React + Vite + Tailwind, Node/Express, JSON storage)

scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c blue,green "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'Auto deploy' || echo 'no changes' && git push origin main
